forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 2 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind 3 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the day reveals itself with a calm grace, draping the city in a patchwork of muted sunlight. The skies are mostly clear, gently kissed by wispy clouds that flirt at the edges of the horizon. A soft breeze carries in the faintest whispers of the lingering marine layer, but visibility remains largely unmarred—a rare gift in this often fog-draped landscape. With a high of 62 degrees lingering tantalizingly nearby, temperatures will soon settle into a cooler embrace, cascading down to 48 degrees as nightfall approaches. 

As you step outside, dress lightly yet wisely—a soft sweater paired with something windproof might best suit your adventure as the warmth of day gives way to the cool embrace of the evening. The atmosphere invites leisurely exploration; stroll down to a nearby café and indulge in the simple pleasure of coffee al fresco, or perhaps take a moment to appreciate the tranquil ambiance of a neighborhood park while the sun makes its graceful descent. In this moment, San Francisco reminds you how to savor the ordinary—sky, breeze, and warmth captured in the fleeting essence of afternoon light.
